title: Happens.. mouse forced top right corner after match
body: Well this happens all the time and it tilts me worse than my teams. after match the mouse icon is forced top right corner some times. it is not my mouse nor my touchpad on computer. The client isn't able to let me close and I have no control over my computer. Now here is how I know its league client, I have a touch screen and cant close client but can use anything else, I just stare at that defeat key and can't change it. As soon as I use touch screen to close game entirely I gain control again and can then use my mouse. Why is my game doing this and how do I prevent it? sorry if I seem rude, I'm on tilt. couldn't even view my stats due to this issue and it made it worse

replies.body:
Hmmm.. Does your computer ship with any gesture-software or anything that supplements the touch screen features? I'd be interested to see if this still happens after [**completing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to prevent any background programs from interacting with League poorly.

Let me know!

doing that would actually disable the NVidia graphics card built into the laptop. I don't know what causes it, and its not every game. its an occasional problem. i do not have an gesture software and its only in End game that causes it. Any other idea what would be the cause?

Performing a clean boot will not disable your nvidia card or driver, you'll just temporarily be without any background apps that normally run.

Let me know how it goes.
top left corner I mean. not right
